name: Save DynamoDB
description: Saves the rows of the incoming DataFrame into DynamoDB and get the credentials from the instance profile.

fields.name: table
fields.title: DynamoDB Table
fields.description: Write to table by overwriting existing item with same keys

fields.name: writeBatchSize
fields.title: WriteBatchSize
fields.description: number of items to send per call to DynamoDB BatchWriteItem. Default 25.

fields.name: targetCapacity
fields.title: TargetCapacity
fields.description: fraction of provisioned write capacity on the table to consume for writing or updating. Default 1 (i.e. 100% capacity).

fields.name: update
fields.title: Update
fields.description: if true items will be written using UpdateItem on keys rather than BatchWriteItem. Default false.

fields.name: throughput
fields.title: Throughput
fields.description: the desired write throughput to use. It overwrites any calculation used by the package. It is intended to be used with tables that are on-demand. Defaults to 100 for on-demand.
